name: Strange Island Dino Hunter Quest Simulator
name_original: Strange Island Dino Hunter Quest Simulator
description:
Strange Island Dino Hunter Quest Simulator

Hunt or be hunted! Be a hunter and face safari hunter adventure.
Spectacular game with excellent location! You can shoot many dinos as you want and you expand your stuff.
In this exciting game only one winner, you or your enemies.
Your mission is to destroy a certain amount of hunting on you prehistoric predators at every level.
If you will manage to survive in a fight thanks to your battle skills, then for each completed level you will get more powerful gun in your arsenal.

This is best action game you are in world biggest real world environment and there is lot of deadly animals you have to find them and hunt them before they hunt you.
This is time to show your hunting skills. There are multiple levels with increasing difficulty levels. in this game.
Deer and wolves take one shot to put down. But when you get to the bears. It's going to take 2. Be careful.
On successful completion of existing level, player will land on next level with enhanced complexity.

In this superior extreme survival game there are 12 different levels with increasing difficulty. Multiple weapons with increasing power to expand your arsenal.
Realistic 3D graphics and amazing immersive gameplay are providing a visceral, dramatic experience and are helping you to travel into the astonishing Island world of your dream, right on the screen of your mobile device, including your phone and tablet!

Features:

- Amazing 3D graphics build just for your.
- 12 huge levels. Each with a new challenge.
- Real sniper physics.
- With real world environment.
- Hunting different Dinos.
